Alias.name: enchant what howmuch
Alias.script: enchantment = matches[3] number = matches[2] enchant(enchantment, number)

Alias.name: Enchant list
Alias.script:
cecho( "<white> Sigils:
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'eye' - Eye Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'key' - Key Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'orb' - Orb Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'cube' - Cube Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'fist' - Fist Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'star' - Star Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'flame' - Flame Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'knife' - Knife Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'monolith' - Monolith Sigil
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'mushroom' - Mushroom Sigil
" )
cecho( "
<white> Resistance:
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'cold' - Cold Resist
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'magic' - Magic Resist
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'fresist' - Fire Resist
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'electric' - Electric Resist
" )
cecho( "
<white> Item Enchantments:
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'meteor' - Meteor Arrow
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'augment' - Augment Armour or Weapon
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'icewall' - Icewall
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'firelash' - Firelash
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'firewall' - Firewall
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'scabbard' - Scabbard of Stasis
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'waterwalking' - Waterwalking
" )
cecho( "
<white> Item Creation:
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'bauble' - Scented Bauble
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'brooch' - Brooch of Thoth
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'purity' - Necklace of Purity
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'stasis' - Bag of Stasis
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'hearing' - Earring of Hearing
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'negation' - Gem of Negation
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'whirlwind' - Whirlwind of Vastar
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'pestilence' - Ring of Pestilence
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'worrystone' - Worrystone
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'concealment' - Orb of Concealment
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey> 'dreamcatcher' - Dreamcatcher
" ) cecho( "<SlateGrey>'comprehension' - Necklace of Comprehension
" )

Alias.name: getgold - obtain gold from a container

Script.name: script
Script.script:
local oubori_data = { [18864] = { "ouroboros60684", "ouroboros203598" }, [21191] = { "ouroboros34462", "ouroboros49014" }, [21192] = { "ouroboros191596", "ouroboros191631" }, [5953] = { "ouroboros36673", "ouroboros36838" }, [5954] = { "ouroboros23502", "ouroboros57255" }, [5955] = { "ouroboros1263", "ouroboros30460" } }
local enchanting = {}
local ouroboros1, ouroboros2
local function getOIDs() -- export to globals so the event handler can get to it svo.checking_oubori = true svo.oubori_data = oubori_data svo.enchanting = enchanting
svo.echof( "Don't know the ourobori IDs for this room, so going to check..." ) send( "ql" ) end
function enchant( enchantment, number ) if not oubori_data[ gmcp.Room.Info.num ] then enchanting = { enchantment, number } getOIDs() return end
ouroboros1 = oubori_data[ gmcp.Room.Info.num ][ 1 ] ouroboros2 = oubori_data[ gmcp.Room.Info.num ][ 2 ]
if ( enchantment == 'eye' ) then eye( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'meteor' ) then meteor( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'waterwalking' ) then waterwalking( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'worrystone' ) then worrystone( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'scabbard' ) then scabbard( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'stasis' ) then stasis( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'firelash' ) then firelash( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'hearing' ) then hearing( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'fist' ) then fist( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'flame' ) then flame( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'key' ) then key( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'knife' ) then knife( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'mushroom' ) then mushroom( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'monolith' ) then monolith( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'cube' ) then cube( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'orb' ) then orb( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'cold' ) then cold( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'electric' ) then electric( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'firewall' ) then firewall( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'brooch' ) then brooch( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'augment' ) then augment( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'magic' ) then magic( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'whirlwind' ) then whirlwind( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'comprehension' ) then comprehension( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'icewall' ) then icewall( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'concealment' ) then concealment( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'fresist' ) then fresist( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'bauble' ) then bauble( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'dreamcatcher' ) then dreamcatcher( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'negation' ) then negation( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'pestilence' ) then pestilence( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'purity' ) then purity( number ) end
if ( enchantment == 'star' ) then star( number ) end end
function purity( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 4 .. " ice" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " dust" ) send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 )
if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " necklace of purity" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " necklace from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function pestilence( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " staghorn" )
send("put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " ring of pestilence" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " ring from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function negation( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" )
if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " gem of negation" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "chant zool ekilthia requi oben" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " gem from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function dreamcatcher( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " goldbar" ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " staghorn" ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 )
if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " dreamcatcher" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " dreamcatcher from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function bauble( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " dust" )
if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " bauble" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "chant disei stalla rapwah cosoth tu" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " bauble from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function fresist( number ) send( "outr 2 silverbar" ) send( "outr 1 ice" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 ) send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with fire resistance" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function concealment( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 5 .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 )
if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " orb of concealment" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "chant aisyalam" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " concealment from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function icewall( number ) send( "outr 1 dust" ) send( "outr 1 ice" ) send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with icewall" ) svo.doadd( "chant incula cela ecta" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function comprehension( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " ice" ) send( "outr " .. number * 4 .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number * 3 .. " staghorn" ) send( "outr " .. number * 3 .. " goldbar" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " necklace of comprehension" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " necklace from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function whirlwind( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " dust" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " staghorn" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " whirlwind of vastar" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " whirlwind from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function magic( number ) send( "outr 2 silverbar" ) send( "outr 5 staghorn" ) send( "outr 1 goldbar" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with magical resistance" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function augment( number ) send( "outr 1 silverbar" ) send( "outr 2 dust" ) send( "outr 1 goldbar" ) send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with augmentation" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function brooch( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " ice" ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " dust" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " staghorn" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 )
if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " brooch of thoth" ) svo.doadd( "chant mortis troy tenkla" ) svo.doadd( "chant mortis troy tenklu" ) svo.doadd( "chant mortis troy tenkli" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " brooch from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function firewall( number ) send( "outr 3 silverbar" ) send( "outr 1 dust" ) send( "outr 3 staghorn" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with firewall" ) svo.doadd( "chant firth ilith rhedo een" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function electric( number ) send( "outr 5 goldbar" ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with electrical resistance" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "outr 2 kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function cold( number ) send( "outr 2 goldbar" ) send( "outr 2 horn" ) send( "outr 2 dust" ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with cold resistance" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function orb( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " dust" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " orb sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant solip preena het epi re enla" ) svo.doadd( "chant solip preena het epi re enla" ) svo.doadd( "chant solip preena het epi re enla" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " orbsigil from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function cube( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " silverbar" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1) send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " cube sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant dara acti me prishna eni not" ) svo.doadd( "chant dara acti me prishna eni not" ) svo.doadd( "chant dara acti me prishna eni not" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " cube from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function mushroom( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " ice" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " mushroom sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant mil usra shal hract reed oom oon mez" ) svo.doadd( "chant mil usra shal hract reed oom oon mez" ) svo.doadd( "chant mil usra shal hract reed oom oon mez" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " mushroom from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function monolith( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " monolith sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant me ol nok oloth lilo ib te het" ) svo.doadd( "chant me ol nok oloth lilo ib te het" ) svo.doadd( "chant me ol nok oloth lilo ib te het" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " monolith from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function knife( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send("put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " knife sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant keef nitash idca feef enla" ) svo.doadd( "chant keef nitash idca feef enla" ) svo.doadd( "chant keef nitash idca feef enla" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " knife from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function key( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " key sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant krolop escit yall" ) svo.doadd( "chant krolop escit yall" ) svo.doadd( "chant krolop escit yall" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " key from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function flame( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " flame sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant flet lhar abe minlo eec" ) svo.doadd( "chant flet lhar abe minlo eec" ) svo.doadd( "chant flet lhar abe minlo eec" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " flame from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function fist( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " staghorn" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " fist sigil" ) svo.doadd( "chant fartak ishla spooz tran" ) svo.doadd( "chant fartak ishla spooz tran" ) svo.doadd( "chant fartak ishla spooz tran" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " fist from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function hearing( number ) send( "outr 4 staghorn" ) send( "outr 3 silverbar" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 ) send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with hearing" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "play horn" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2) end
function eye( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " obsidian" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put obsidian in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group obsidian in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " eye sigil" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " eye from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function worrystone( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " ice" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " goldbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " staghorn" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " dust" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " worrystone" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "getgold 1$flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "flipcoin" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " worrystone from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function meteor( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " dust" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put arrow in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) svo.doadd( "put " .. number .. " arrow in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
svo.doadd( "begin creation of " .. number .. " meteor" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "chant minlo ecta tu ecta oloth rhedo" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " meteor from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function waterwalking( number ) send( "outr 1 ice" ) send( "outr 2 goldbar" ) send( "outr 1 silverbar" ) send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 ) send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with walk on water" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function scabbard( number ) send( "outr 3 ice" ) send( "outr 3 goldbar" ) send( "outr 2 silverbar" ) send( "outr 3 dust" ) send( "outr 3 horn" ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 ) send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with stasis " ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "wave arms" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "chant drabbacs statorium" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function stasis( number ) send( "outr " .. number * 3 .. " ice" ) send( "outr " .. number * 4 .. " goldbar" ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number * 2 .. " dust" ) send( "outr " .. number * 3 .. " staghorn" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end
send( "put group ice in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group staghorn in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " bag of stasis" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "chant stasis statorium" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "square the circle" ) svo.doadd( "wave feather" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "outr kola$crush kola" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " bag from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function firelash( number ) send( "outr 1 goldbar" ) send( "outr 1 silverbar" ) send( "outr 2 dust" ) send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group dust in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put " .. number .. " in " .. ouroboros2 )
send( "begin enchantment of " .. number .. " with firelash" ) svo.doadd( "bang drum" ) svo.doadd( "clap hands" ) svo.doadd( "burn incense" ) svo.doadd( "point sword" ) svo.doadd( "light candle" ) svo.doadd( "chant fo icti re eschle lok ast suh hrat" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "spin around thrice" ) svo.doadd( "burn the polygon" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "roll dice" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " from " .. ouroboros2 ) end
function star( number ) send( "outr " .. number .. " silverbar" ) send( "outr " .. number*2 .. " goldbar" ) if ( number == '1' ) then send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) else send( "put group goldbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) send( "put group silverbar in " .. ouroboros1 ) end send( "begin creation of " .. number .. " star sigil" ) svo.doadd( "strum lute" ) svo.doadd( "ring bell" ) svo.doadd( "end ritual" ) svo.doadd( "get " .. number .. " star from " .. ouroboros2 ) end

Script.name: svo_ourobori
Script.script:
function svo_ourobori() if not svo.checking_oubori or gmcp.Char.Items.List.location ~= "room" then return end
for _, item in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Items.List.items) do if item.name == 'a beguiling ouroboros' then svo.oubori_data[gmcp.Room.Info.num] = svo.oubori_data[gmcp.Room.Info.num] or {} table.insert(svo.oubori_data[gmcp.Room.Info.num], "ouroboros"..item.id) end end
if not svo.oubori_data[gmcp.Room.Info.num] then svo.echof("Hey, I don't think there are actually are any ourobori here :|") else svo.enchant(svo.enchanting[1], svo.enchanting[2]) end
-- clean up globals svo.checking_oubori, svo.enchanting, svo.oubori_data = nil, nil, nil end
